reviews.review: 90% of the cast gives top level performances, especially my main man Thanos. Believe it or not, he's kinda the hero in this one. From what little I know about the comics this interpretation of Thanos is FAR better. (think the comics have his motivations being wanting to bang the embodiment of death? lolwut?)
10 years in the making and itâ€™s simply phenomenal
An outstanding move.  Marvel's best movie to date.
This is just garbage. The storyline is horrible and choppy. The characters are blah. Marvel really is milking this stuff for all the money they can, while running it into the ground.

It's an extraordinary crossover movie. The way that all the elements and characters connect makes you think that you need them in real life. The only thing that maybe we don't like it's the CGI exaggerated.
Wow. I'm still in utter disbelief, but wow. The sequel is only a month away, but it seems like I'll be waiting for a million years.
Enjoyable film, loved seeing all of the Avengers together with such a huge awesome cast... But overall, the film was overhyped imo.

A great movie, most definitely the best one yet to be offered by the MCU[Marvel Cinematic Universe], boasting a huge cast of characters and multiple interesting events. The movie is centered around the villain, and takes a daring turn with its end, however that is all brought down by the knowledge that nothing will truly be final, as Disney would not allow many iconic characters to die and, potentially, limit the amount of sequels that can be made. The performances of almost all actors are incredible, notable of whom are Cris Pratt, Christ Hemsworth and Robert Downey Jr. Elizabeth Olsen, Tom Holland and Tom Hiddleston gave immaculate performances. However, this movie is the movie in which Josh Brolin shines brightest of all the stars, giving an incredible performance that will, most likely, be remembered for long, long after this movie has been seen by the viewers.
A sublime film, Avengers: Infinity War should be watched by everyone, so that they can re-experience respect for Super-Hero movies.
So good. So so good. Please kill Bree larson in the next movie, we don't want to see her character in the MCU at all. She will destroy it. Kill her character off ASAP
